version_description:
Thanks for using Spotafriend!

Version 2.0, major updates now available.

New features in 2.0:
- Profile now with multiple pictures.
- Import pictures from Facebook and Instagram.
- Common Interest section available on the profile.
- Added SuperSwipe that let you friend instantaneously a user.

Fixes:
- Infinite loading on Facebook Log In
- For some users crashes when trying to scroll on the match screen
- For some users crashes when opening photo viewer
- Importing Facebook interests
- Other minor bug fixes

Please take a moment to provide a review. Your feedback is fully appreciated!

Thanks for using Spotafriend!

Version 2.0, major updates now available.

New features in 2.0.2:
- It is now possible to delete interests
- Guidance added for Superswipes and Filters

New features in 2.0:
- Profile now with multiple pictures.
- Import pictures from Facebook and Instagram.
- Common Interest section available on the profile.
- Added SuperSwipe that let you friend instantaneously a user.

Fixes:
- Other minor bug fixes

Please take a moment to provide a review. Your feedback is fully appreciated!

Thanks for using Spotafriend!

New - Updated layout, smoother look
New - In-app notifications in all over the app to keep you updated all the time
New - In the same time you can upload multiple pictures from your profile view
New - You can forward members to any of your friends

Fix - Bug and Crash fixes

Please take a moment to provide a review. Your feedback is fully appreciated!

New - You can forward members to any of your friends

Please take a moment to provide a review. Your feedback is fully appreciated!

Please take a moment to provide a review. Your feedback is fully appreciated!

Thanks for using Spotafriend!

We have reviewed all users' suggestions and added exciting features to the app! The new version still has all the features that you liked but now connectivity will be greatly enhanced, giving you the best friends making experience!

Here's what we introduce in 3.0:

- Videos can be added to your profile.
- Achievements will reward you by making your profile better.
- Ever wished you could review your swipes? That's now history!
- Become an Ultimate Member and unlock, EVERYTHING!

Please take a moment to provide a review. Your feedback is fully appreciated!

We are really excited to announce that we have released Spotafriend 5.0!

This new version still has all the features that you liked, giving you the best friends making experience.

New features:

- A whole new full screen swiping experience
- Booster to place you on the top of the pile
- Booster to reset all your sent swipes
- Booster to know who swiped you
- Booster to change your sent swipe
- You can now search for a specific user in filters

- Many bugs fixed:
* Swipe Them All, you will not swipe back anymore the same users you already swiped.
* Unfriend user, will not added back in your swipe list.

Hopefully you enjoy this new release our team worked really hard!

Please take a moment to provide a review. Your feedback is fully appreciated!

The Spotafriend Team

Thanks for using Spotafriend!

We have reviewed all users' suggestions and resolved minor bugs.

- You now have the possibility to add a intro line to your profile.

- You can now easily see the number of photos on the profile of other users.

The new version still has all the features that you liked but now connectivity will be greatly enhanced, giving you the best friends making experience!

We are really excited to announce that we have released Spotafriend 5.0!

This new version still has all the features that you liked, giving you the best friends making experience.

New features:

- A whole new full screen swiping experience
- Booster to place you on the top of the pile
- Booster to reset all your sent swipes
- Booster to know who swiped you
- Booster to change your sent swipe
- You can now search for a specific user in filters
- Many bugs fixed

Hopefully you enjoy this new release our team worked really hard!

Please take a moment to provide a review. Your feedback is fully appreciated!

The Spotafriend Team

We are really excited to announce that we have released Spotafriend 5.0!

This new version still has all the features that you liked, giving you the best friends making experience.

New features:

- A whole new full screen swiping experience
- Booster to place you on the top of the pile
- Booster to reset all your sent swipes
- Booster to know who swiped you
- Booster to change your sent swipe
- You can now search for a specific user in filters

- Many bugs fixed:
* Swipe Them All, you will not swipe back anymore the same users you already swiped.
* Unfriend user, will not added back in your swipe list.

Hopefully you enjoy this new release our team worked really hard!

Please take a moment to provide a review. Your feedback is fully appreciated!

The Spotafriend Team
